<style id='block-visibility-screen-size-styles-inline-css'>
/* Large screens (desktops, 782px and up) */
@media ( min-width: 782px ) {
	.block-visibility-hide-large-screen {
		display: none !important;
	}
}

/* Medium screens (tablets, between 600px and 782px) */
@media ( min-width: 600px ) and ( max-width: 781.98px ) {
	.block-visibility-hide-medium-screen {
		display: none !important;
	}
}

/* Small screens (mobile devices, less than 600px) */
@media ( max-width: 599.98px ) {
	.block-visibility-hide-small-screen {
		display: none !important;
	}
}
</style>

  position: static;
}

  padding: 17px 0 21px;
  list-style: none !important;
  width: 100%;
  z-index: 100;
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: opacity 0.2s, visibility 0.2s;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: flex-end;

  display: none;
  gap: 16px;
  position: relative;
}

  display: flex;
  max-height: 100vh;
  overflow: visible;
}

  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;

  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  z-index: -1;
  background: rgba(240, 237, 227, 0.41);
}

  .wp-block-megamenu-item.device-visibility-mobile {
    display: none;
  }
}

    display: none;
  }

</style>
<style id='wp-block-spacer-inline-css'>
.wp-block-spacer{clear:both}
.wp-block-spacer{margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;}
</style>

</style>

<style id='wp-block-separator-inline-css'>
@charset "UTF-8";.wp-block-separator{border:1px solid;border-left:none;border-right:none}.wp-block-separator.is-style-dots{background:none!important;border:none;height:auto;line-height:1;text-align:center}.wp-block-separator.is-style-dots:before{color:currentColor;content:"···";font-family:serif;font-size:1.5em;letter-spacing:2em;padding-left:2em}

<style id='wp-block-columns-inline-css'>
.wp-block-columns{align-items:normal!important;box-sizing:border-box;display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap!important}@media (min-width:782px){.wp-block-columns{flex-wrap:nowrap!important}}.wp-block-columns.are-vertically-aligned-top{align-items:flex-start}.wp-block-columns.are-vertically-aligned-center{align-items:center}.wp-block-columns.are-vertically-aligned-bottom{align-items:flex-end}@media (max-width:781px){.wp-block-columns:not(.is-not-stacked-on-mobile)>.wp-block-column{flex-basis:100%!important}}@media (min-width:782px){.wp-block-columns:not(.is-not-stacked-on-mobile)>.wp-block-column{flex-basis:0;flex-grow:1}.wp-block-columns:not(.is-not-stacked-on-mobile)>.wp-block-column[style*=flex-basis]{flex-grow:0}}.wp-block-columns.is-not-stacked-on-mobile{flex-wrap:nowrap!important}.wp-block-columns.is-not-stacked-on-mobile>.wp-block-column{flex-basis:0;flex-grow:1}.wp-block-columns.is-not-stacked-on-mobile>.wp-block-column[style*=flex-basis]{flex-grow:0}:where(.wp-block-columns){margin-bottom:1.75em}:where(.wp-block-columns.has-background){padding:1.25em 2.375em}.wp-block-column{flex-grow:1;min-width:0;overflow-wrap:break-word;word-break:break-word}.wp-block-column.is-vertically-aligned-top{align-self:flex-start}.wp-block-column.is-vertically-aligned-center{align-self:center}.wp-block-column.is-vertically-aligned-bottom{align-self:flex-end}.wp-block-column.is-vertically-aligned-bottom,.wp-block-column.is-vertically-aligned-center,.wp-block-column.is-vertically-aligned-top{width:100%}

<style id='wp-block-post-featured-image-inline-css'>
.wp-block-post-featured-image{margin-left:0;margin-right:0}.wp-block-post-featured-image a{display:block;height:100%}.wp-block-post-featured-image img{box-sizing:border-box;height:auto;max-width:100%;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%}.wp-block-post-featured-image.alignfull img,.wp-block-post-featured-image.alignwide img{width:100%}.wp-block-post-featured-image .wp-block-post-featured-image__overlay.has-background-dim{background-color:#000;inset:0;position:absolute}.wp-block-post-featured-image{position:relative}.wp-block-post-featured-image .wp-block-post-featured-image__overlay.has-background-gradient{background-color:transparent}.wp-block-post-featured-image .wp-block-post-featured-image__overlay.has-background-dim-0{opacity:0}.wp-block-post-featured-image .wp-block-post-featured-image__overlay.has-background-dim-10{opacity:.1}.wp-block-post-featured-image .wp-block-post-featured-image__overlay.has-background-dim-20{opacity:.2}.wp-block-post-featured-image .wp-block-post-featured-image__overlay.has-background-dim-30{opacity:.3}.wp-block-post-featured-image .wp-block-post-featured-image__overlay.has-background-dim-40{opacity:.4}.wp-block-post-featured-image .wp-block-post-featured-image__overlay.has-background-dim-50{opacity:.5}.wp-block-post-featured-image .wp-block-post-featured-image__overlay.has-background-dim-60{opacity:.6}.wp-block-post-featured-image .wp-block-post-featured-image__overlay.has-background-dim-70{opacity:.7}.wp-block-post-featured-image .wp-block-post-featured-image__overlay.has-background-dim-80{opacity:.8}.wp-block-post-featured-image .wp-block-post-featured-image__overlay.has-background-dim-90{opacity:.9}.wp-block-post-featured-image .wp-block-post-featured-image__overlay.has-background-dim-100{opacity:1}

<style id='global-styles-inline-css'>
body{--wp--preset--color--black: #000000;--wp--preset--color--cyan-bluish-gray: #abb8c3;--wp--preset--color--white: #ffffff;--wp--preset--color--pale-pink: #f78da7;--wp--preset--color--vivid-red: var(--wp--style--root--padding-bottom); }.has-global-padding { padding-right: var(--wp--style--root--padding-right); padding-left: var(--wp--style--root--padding-left); }.has-global-padding :where(.has-global-padding) { padding-right: 0; padding-left: 0; }.has-global-padding > .alignfull { margin-right: calc(var(--wp--style--root--padding-right) * -1); margin-left: calc(var(--wp--style--root--padding-left) * -1); }.has-global-padding :where(.has-global-padding) > .alignfull { margin-right: 0; margin-left: 0; }.has-global-padding > .alignfull:where(:not(.has-global-padding)) > :where([class*="wp-block-"]:not(.alignfull):not([class*="__"]),p,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,ul,ol) { padding-right: var(--wp--style--root--padding-right); padding-left: var(--wp--style--root--padding-left); }.has-global-padding :where(.has-global-padding) > .alignfull:where(:not(.has-global-padding)) > :where([class*="wp-block-"]:not(.alignfull):not([class*="__"]),p,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,ul,ol) { padding-right: 0; padding-left: 0; }.wp-site-blocks > .alignleft { float: left; margin-right: 2em; }.wp-site-blocks > .alignright { float: right; margin-left: 2em; }.wp-site-blocks > .aligncenter { justify-content: center; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; }:where(.wp-site-blocks) > * { margin-block-start: 20px; margin-block-end: 0; }:where(.wp-site-blocks) > :first-child:first-child { margin-block-start: 0; }:where(.wp-site-blocks) > :last-child:last-child { margin-block-end: 0; }body { --wp--style--block-gap: 20px; }:where(body .is-layout-flow)  > :first-child:first-child{margin-block-start: 0;}:where(body .is-layout-flow)  > :last-child:last-child{margin-block-end: 0;}:where(body .is-layout-flow)  > *{margin-block-start: 20px;margin-block-end: 0;}:where(body .is-layout-constrained)  > :first-child:first-child{margin-block-start: 0;}:where(body .is-layout-constrained)  > :last-child:last-child{margin-block-end: 0;}:where(body .is-layout-constrained)  > *{margin-block-start: 20px;margin-block-end: 0;}:where(body .is-layout-flex) {gap: 20px;}:where(body .is-layout-grid) {gap: 20px;}body .is-layout-flow > .alignleft{float: left;margin-inline-start: 0;margin-inline-end: 2em;}body .is-layout-flow > .alignright{float: right;margin-inline-start: 2em;margin-inline-end: 0;}body .is-layout-flow > .aligncenter{margin-left: auto !important;margin-right: auto !important;}body .is-layout-constrained > .alignleft{float: 	display: flex;
  flex-direction: column-reverse;
  
}

	margin: 0 0 var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);
}

  font-size: var(--wp--preset--font-size--heading-4);
	font-weight: 700;
}

	text-decoration: none;
}
.wp-block-jetpack-related-posts [class$="__post-link"] a:hover {
	color: var(--wp--preset--color--red);
}

	-webkit-appearance: auto;
    -moz-appearance: auto;
    appearance: auto;
    display: initial;
}

	vertical-align: text-top;

}

}

</style>

<div class="wp-block-group site-content is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow"><div class="entry-content wp-block-post-content is-layout-flow wp-block-post-content-is-layout-flow">
<div class="wp-block-group is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow">
<div class="wp-block-cover is-light" style="padding-top:45px;padding-bottom:0px;min-height:520px"><span aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-cover__background has-background-dim-40 has-background-dim"></span><img decoding="async" fetchpriority="high" width="1920" height="1080" class="wp-block-cover__image-background wp-image-20131" alt="" src="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/2023-hero-release-announcement-copyright.jpg" style="object-position:50% 24%" data-object-fit="cover" data-object-position="50% 24%" srcset="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/2023-hero-release-announcement-copyright.jpg 1920w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/2023-hero-release-announcement-copyright.jpg?resize=300,169 300w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/2023-hero-release-announcement-copyright.jpg?resize=768,432 768w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/2023-hero-release-announcement-copyright.jpg?resize=1024,576 1024w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/2023-hero-release-announcement-copyright.jpg?resize=1536,864 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1920px) 100vw, 1920px" /><div class="wp-block-cover__inner-container is-layout-flow wp-block-cover-is-layout-flow">
<div class="wp-block-group has-background-color has-text-color has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-container-8 wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained">
<h1 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-heading-1-font-size"><strong><strong><strong><strong><strong><strong><strong><strong><em>JESUS:</em> Releasing 2025</strong></strong></strong></strong></strong></strong></strong></strong></h1>



<p class="has-text-align-center has-apercupro-font-family" style="font-size:21px;font-style:normal;font-weight:500">Announcing a new, animated family film about the life of Jesus.</p>



<div class="wp-block-buttons is-content-justification-center is-layout-flex wp-container-7 wp-block-buttons-is-layout-flex" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">
<div class="wp-block-button is-style-fill"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-background-color has-text-color wp-element-button" href="/blog/announcing-jesus-2025/">Learn More</a></div>
</div>



<div style="height:15px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
</div>
</div></div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-apercupro-font-family has-heading-3-font-size is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:700;letter-spacing:1.4px">
<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-splide-carousel wp-block-splide-carousel__container home-lang-scroller"><figure class="wp-block-splide-carousel splide" data-splide="{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;loop&quot;,&quot;perPage&quot;:1,&quot;speed&quot;:&quot;400&quot;,&quot;gap&quot;:&quot;10px&quot;,&quot;fixedWidth&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;autoWidth&quot;:true,&quot;perMove&quot;:1,&quot;direction&quot;:&quot;ltr&quot;,&quot;fixedHeight&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;height&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;arrows&quot;:false,&quot;pagination&quot;:false,&quot;autoplay&quot;:false,&quot;interval&quot;:&quot;5000&quot;,&quot;pauseOnHover&quot;:false,&quot;mediaQuery&quot;:&quot;max&quot;,&quot;breakpoints&quot;:{},&quot;drag&quot;:false,&quot;autoScroll&quot;:{&quot;pauseOnHover&quot;:false}}" data-splide-extensions="{&quot;autoScroll&quot;:true,&quot;urlHash&quot;:false,&quot;grid&quot;:false}"><div class="wp-block-splide-carousel__track splide__track"><div class="wp-block-splide-carousel__list splide__list">
<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-splide-carousel-item wp-block-splide-carousel__slide splide__slide">
<p>Jėzus yra Viešpats.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-splide-carousel-item wp-block-splide-carousel__slide splide__slide">
<p>ישוע הוא אדון.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-splide-carousel-item wp-block-splide-carousel__slide splide__slide">
<p>Yesu ni Bwana.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-splide-carousel-item wp-block-splide-carousel__slide splide__slide">
<p>Jesus is Lord.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-splide-carousel-item wp-block-splide-carousel__slide splide__slide">
<p>Jesus es el Señor.</p>
</div>
</div></div></figure></div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group hero-section has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--16)">
<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-16 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:452px">
<p class="has-apercupro-font-family" style="margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--30);font-style:normal;font-weight:500;line-height:1.2">Share the Story of Jesus With Everyone, Everywhere.</p>



<h1 class="wp-block-heading" style="margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20)">A Christian Media Ministry Bringing Millions Face-to-Face With Jesus In Their Heart Language.</h1>



<hr class="wp-block-separator has-alpha-channel-opacity" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--auto);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--30)"/>



<p class="has-medium-font-size">One of the most powerful ways of experiencing the story of Christ is by watching it play out on screen. Our free <a href="/watch/">online Christian films and ministry tools</a> help deliver the message of the gospel in 2,000 languages and counting.</p>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-content-justification-left is-layout-constrained wp-container-13 wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained">
<div class="wp-block-buttons is-layout-flex wp-block-buttons-is-layout-flex" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--50)">
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-50"><a class="wp-block-button__link wp-element-button" href="/partners/">Become a Partner</a></div>



<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-50"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-red-background-color has-background wp-element-button" href="/how-to-help/ways-to-donate/give-now/?amount=&amp;frequency=single&amp;campaign-code=YXWJPO&amp;designation-number=2592320&amp;thankYouRedirect=https://www.jesusfilm.org/dev/special/thank-you-refer/social-share/">Give Today</a></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<div style="height:10px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>



<figure class="wp-block-image size-large is-resized is-style-default"><img decoding="async" width="2048" height="1365" src="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/jfp-home-page-10-2023.jpg?w=1024" alt="" class="wp-image-18608" style="aspect-ratio:1.7808695652173914;object-fit:cover;width:691px" srcset="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/jfp-home-page-10-2023.jpg 2048w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/jfp-home-page-10-2023.jpg?resize=300,200 300w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/jfp-home-page-10-2023.jpg?resize=768,512 768w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/jfp-home-page-10-2023.jpg?resize=1024,683 1024w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/jfp-home-page-10-2023.jpg?resize=1536,1024 1536w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/jfp-home-page-10-2023.jpg?resize=600,400 600w" sizes="(max-width: 2048px) 100vw, 2048px" /></figure>
</div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--50);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--50)">
<div class="wp-block-cards-27 wp-block-cloudcatch-cards wp-block-cards columns-3">
<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-cards-card wp-block-card is-no-media"><figure class="wp-block-card__media"></figure><div class="wp-block-card__content is-layout-flow wp-block-cards-card-is-layout-flow">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">Grow your Christian ministry.</h2>



<p>Spark conversations about Jesus wherever you are with Jesus Film Project. Use our free <em>Christian media ministry resources</em> to equip your leaders with <a href="/partners/resources/strategies/">strategies to share the gospel</a> anywhere</p>



<div class="wp-block-buttons is-layout-flex wp-block-buttons-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-button"><a class="wp-block-button__link wp-element-button" href="/partners/resources/">Find Resources</a></div>
</div>
</div></div>



<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-cards-card wp-block-card is-media-background has-background-color has-text-color" style="background-image:url(https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/become-partner.jpg)"><figure class="wp-block-card__media"><img decoding="async" width="800" height="533" src="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/become-partner.jpg" class="wp-image-12389 size-full" srcset="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/become-partner.jpg 800w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/become-partner.jpg?resize=300,200 300w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/become-partner.jpg?resize=768,512 768w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/become-partner.jpg?resize=600,400 600w" sizes="(max-width: 800px) 100vw, 800px" /></figure><div class="wp-block-card__content is-layout-flow wp-block-cards-card-is-layout-flow">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">Empower your ministry by becoming a partner.</h2>



<p>Get access to free Christian ministry resources and outreach strategies to share Jesus with the world</p>



<div class="wp-block-buttons is-layout-flex wp-block-buttons-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-button"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-warm-white-background-color has-background wp-element-button" href="/partners/">Become a Partner</a></div>
</div>
</div></div>



<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-cards-card wp-block-card is-no-media is-style-brand-red has-background-color has-text-color"><figure class="wp-block-card__media"></figure><div class="wp-block-card__content is-layout-flow wp-block-cards-card-is-layout-flow">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-heading-1-font-size">Globally Ranked a Top 10 Ministry</h2>



<p style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--auto)">Based on impact and effectiveness by <a href="https://roiministry.org/jesus-film-project/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener"><mark style="background-color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)" class="has-inline-color has-background-color"><span style="text-decoration: underline;">ROI Ministries</span></mark></a>.</p>
</div></div>



<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-cards-card wp-block-card is-no-media" style="grid-column-end:span 6"><figure class="wp-block-card__media"></figure><div class="wp-block-card__content is-layout-flow wp-block-cards-card-is-layout-flow">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">Jesus Film Project is a Cru<sup>®</sup> ministry.</h2>



<p>And we’re committed to providing <a href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/partners/resources/">Christian films, tools and strategies</a> that help you and your growing ministry share the message of the gospel with everyone, everywhere.</p>



<div class="wp-block-buttons is-layout-flex wp-block-buttons-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-button"><a class="wp-block-button__link wp-element-button" href="/about/">About Us</a></div>
</div>
</div></div>



<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-cards-card wp-block-card is-no-media" style="grid-column-end:span 6"><figure class="wp-block-card__media"></figure><div class="wp-block-card__content is-layout-flow wp-block-cards-card-is-layout-flow">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">Together, we can reach 5 billion people with the gospel by 2025.</h2>



<p style="margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">Help our Christian media ministry share the message of forgiveness through Jesus across the globe. Make a donation today.</p>



<div class="wp-block-buttons is-layout-flex wp-block-buttons-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-button"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-red-background-color has-background wp-element-button" href="/how-to-help/ways-to-donate/give-now/?amount=&amp;frequency=single&amp;campaign-code=NXWJPO&amp;designation-number=2592320&amp;thankYouRedirect=https://www.jesusfilm.org/dev/special/thank-you-refer/social-share/">Give a Gift</a></div>
</div>
</div></div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-36 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--50)">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-container-30 wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:33.3%">
<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-content-justification-left is-layout-constrained wp-container-28 wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-heading-1-font-size" style="margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--36)">Grow in Your Walk of Faith</h2>
</div>



<hr class="wp-block-separator has-text-color has-light-soft-gray-color has-alpha-channel-opacity has-light-soft-gray-background-color has-background is-style-default"/>



<p style="margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--30)">Learn how you can reach your community, your church, your Bible study and the people in your world.</p>



<div class="wp-block-buttons is-layout-flex wp-block-buttons-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-button"><a class="wp-block-button__link wp-element-button" href="/blog/">Discover More</a></div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<div class="wp-block-query is-layout-flow wp-block-query-is-layout-flow"><ul class="columns-2 wp-block-post-template is-layout-grid wp-container-33 wp-block-post-template-is-layout-grid"><li class="wp-block-post post-20116 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-heart-for-the-world category-jesus-christ category-jesus-film-project category-media category-reaching-the-nations">
<figure style="width:100%;height:237px;" class="wp-block-post-featured-image"><a href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/blog/announcing-jesus-2025/" target="_self" style="height:237px"><img loading="lazy" width="1024" height="554" src="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Jesus-Reveal.jpg?w=1024" class="attachment-post-thumbnail size-post-thumbnail wp-post-image" alt="Announcing &#8220;JESUS&#8221;: A New Animated Film, Releasing 2025" decoding="async" style="height:237px;object-fit:cover;" srcset="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Jesus-Reveal.jpg 1920w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Jesus-Reveal.jpg?resize=300,162 300w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Jesus-Reveal.jpg?resize=768,415 768w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Jesus-Reveal.jpg?resize=1024,554 1024w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Jesus-Reveal.jpg?resize=1536,830 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" /></a></figure>


<div class="wp-block-group post-meta-row has-apercupro-font-family is-nowrap is-layout-flex wp-container-31 wp-block-group-is-layout-flex" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--16);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);font-style:normal;font-weight:500;text-transform:uppercase"><div class="wp-block-post-date"><time datetime="2023-11-30T21:00:00-05:00">11/30/2023</time></div>


<p>·</p>


<div class="taxonomy-category wp-block-post-terms"><a href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/blog/category/heart-for-the-world/" rel="tag">Heart for the World</a><span class="wp-block-post-terms__separator">, </span><a href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/blog/category/jesus-christ/" rel="tag">Jesus Christ</a><span class="wp-block-post-terms__separator">, </span><a href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/blog/category/jesus-film-project/" rel="tag">Jesus Film Project</a><span class="wp-block-post-terms__separator">, </span><a href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/blog/category/media/" rel="tag">Media</a><span class="wp-block-post-terms__separator">, </span><a href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/blog/category/reaching-the-nations/" rel="tag">Reaching the Nations</a></div></div>


<h3 style="margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-right:0;margin-left:0;" class="wp-block-post-title"><a href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/blog/announcing-jesus-2025/" target="_self">Announcing &#8220;JESUS&#8221;: A New Animated Film, Releasing 2025</a></h3>

<div style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--12);" class="wp-block-post-excerpt"><p class="wp-block-post-excerpt__excerpt">We are thrilled to announce our newest cinematic undertaking: JESUS (2025) — a new, animated family film about the life of Jesus.&hellip;</p><p class="wp-block-post-excerpt__more-text"><a class="wp-block-post-excerpt__more-link" href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/blog/announcing-jesus-2025/">Continue Reading</a></p></div>
</li><li class="wp-block-post post-19888 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-heart-for-the-world">
<figure style="width:100%;height:237px;" class="wp-block-post-featured-image"><a href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/blog/christmas-traditions/" target="_self" style="height:237px"><img loading="lazy" width="1024" height="576" src="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Christmas-Traditions-from-Around-the-World-.jpg?w=1024" class="attachment-post-thumbnail size-post-thumbnail wp-post-image" alt="Christmas Traditions from Around the World" decoding="async" style="height:237px;object-fit:cover;" srcset="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Christmas-Traditions-from-Around-the-World-.jpg 2048w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Christmas-Traditions-from-Around-the-World-.jpg?resize=300,169 300w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Christmas-Traditions-from-Around-the-World-.jpg?resize=768,432 768w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Christmas-Traditions-from-Around-the-World-.jpg?resize=1024,576 1024w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Christmas-Traditions-from-Around-the-World-.jpg?resize=1536,864 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" /></a></figure>


<div class="wp-block-group post-meta-row has-apercupro-font-family is-nowrap is-layout-flex wp-container-32 wp-block-group-is-layout-flex" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--16);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);font-style:normal;font-weight:500;text-transform:uppercase"><div class="wp-block-post-date"><time datetime="2023-11-20T16:41:27-05:00">11/20/2023</time></div>


<p>·</p>


<div class="taxonomy-category wp-block-post-terms"><a href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/blog/category/heart-for-the-world/" rel="tag">Heart for the World</a></div></div>


<h3 style="margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-right:0;margin-left:0;" class="wp-block-post-title"><a href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/blog/christmas-traditions/" target="_self">Christmas Traditions from Around the World</a></h3>

<div style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--12);" class="wp-block-post-excerpt"><p class="wp-block-post-excerpt__excerpt">Christmas is a bit of a strange holiday. For Christians, it’s obviously a meaningful holiday celebrating Jesus&#8217;s birth — even if He&hellip;</p><p class="wp-block-post-excerpt__more-text"><a class="wp-block-post-excerpt__more-link" href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/blog/christmas-traditions/">Continue Reading</a></p></div>
</li></ul>

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained">
<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-splide-carousel wp-block-splide-carousel__container home-info-boxes"><figure class="wp-block-splide-carousel splide" data-splide="{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;loop&quot;,&quot;perPage&quot;:1,&quot;speed&quot;:&quot;400&quot;,&quot;gap&quot;:&quot;14px&quot;,&quot;fixedWidth&quot;:&quot;278px&quot;,&quot;autoWidth&quot;:false,&quot;perMove&quot;:1,&quot;direction&quot;:&quot;ltr&quot;,&quot;fixedHeight&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;height&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;arrows&quot;:false,&quot;pagination&quot;:true,&quot;autoplay&quot;:false,&quot;interval&quot;:&quot;5000&quot;,&quot;pauseOnHover&quot;:true,&quot;mediaQuery&quot;:&quot;min&quot;,&quot;breakpoints&quot;:{&quot;782&quot;:{&quot;destroy&quot;:true}},&quot;focus&quot;:&quot;center&quot;}" data-splide-extensions="{&quot;autoScroll&quot;:false,&quot;urlHash&quot;:false,&quot;grid&quot;:false}"><div class="wp-block-splide-carousel__track splide__track"><div class="wp-block-splide-carousel__list splide__list">
<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-splide-carousel-item wp-block-splide-carousel__slide splide__slide">
<div class="wp-block-cards-39 wp-block-cloudcatch-cards wp-block-cards columns-1">
<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-cards-card wp-block-card is-no-media is-style-brand-red has-background-color has-text-color"><figure class="wp-block-card__media"></figure><div class="wp-block-card__content is-layout-flow wp-block-cards-card-is-layout-flow">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">Additional Ways You Can Help.</h2>



<p class="has-medium-font-size">You can join us on the journey of sharing the story of Jesus.</p>
</div></div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-splide-carousel-item wp-block-splide-carousel__slide splide__slide">
<div class="wp-block-cards-42 wp-block-cloudcatch-cards wp-block-cards columns-1">
<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-cards-card wp-block-card has-background-dim-40 is-media-background is-style-default has-background-color has-text-color" style="background-image:url(https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/mission-trips.jpg)"><figure class="wp-block-card__media"><img decoding="async" src="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/mission-trips.jpg"/></figure><div class="wp-block-card__content is-layout-flow wp-block-cards-card-is-layout-flow">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">Short-Term<br>Mission Trips</h2>



<p class="has-medium-font-size">Travel and proclaim the gospel in countries with little to no access to the gospel.</p>



<div class="wp-block-buttons is-content-justification-center is-layout-flex wp-container-40 wp-block-buttons-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-button"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-warm-white-background-color has-background has-text-align-center wp-element-button" href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/partners/mission-trips/">Explore Trip Opportunities</a></div>
</div>
</div></div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-splide-carousel-item wp-block-splide-carousel__slide splide__slide">
<div class="wp-block-cards-45 wp-block-cloudcatch-cards wp-block-cards columns-1">
<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-cards-card wp-block-card is-no-media is-style-default has-background-background-color has-background"><figure class="wp-block-card__media"></figure><div class="wp-block-card__content is-layout-flow wp-block-cards-card-is-layout-flow">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">Prayers</h2>



<p class="has-medium-font-size">Prayer is central to fulfilling the Great Commission together.</p>



<div class="wp-block-buttons is-content-justification-center is-layout-flex wp-container-43 wp-block-buttons-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-button"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-dark-gray-background-color has-background has-text-align-center wp-element-button" href="/partners/resources/pray/">Pray With Us</a></div>
</div>
</div></div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-splide-carousel-item wp-block-splide-carousel__slide splide__slide">
<div class="wp-block-cards-48 wp-block-cloudcatch-cards wp-block-cards columns-1">
<div class="wp-block-cloudcatch-cards-card wp-block-card is-media-background is-style-default has-warm-white-background-color has-background" style="background-image:url(https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/2023-hero-plant-church-02.jpg?w=780)"><figure class="wp-block-card__media"><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="855" height="1123" src="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/2023-hero-plant-church-02.jpg?w=780" class="wp-image-20000 size-full" srcset="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/2023-hero-plant-church-02.jpg 855w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/2023-hero-plant-church-02.jpg?resize=228,300 228w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/2023-hero-plant-church-02.jpg?resize=768,1009 768w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/2023-hero-plant-church-02.jpg?resize=780,1024 780w" sizes="(max-width: 855px) 100vw, 855px" /></figure><div class="wp-block-card__content is-layout-flow wp-block-cards-card-is-layout-flow">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-background-color has-text-color"><strong>Help Plant a Church</strong></h2>



<p class="has-background-color has-text-color has-medium-font-size">Your gift sends <em>JESUS</em> film teams into unreached communities to share the gospel and help transform lives.</p>



<div class="wp-block-buttons is-content-justification-center is-layout-flex wp-container-46 wp-block-buttons-is-layout-flex">

</div>
</div></div>
</div>
</div>
</div></div></figure></div>
</div>

<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--30)">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">Download Our App</h2>



<p>The Jesus Film Project<sup>®</sup> app is available on iOS and Android devices. Get it for free to watch and share videos wherever you are in the world.</p>



<div style="height:24px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-content-justification-left is-layout-constrained wp-container-51 wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained">
<div class="wp-block-buttons is-layout-flex wp-block-buttons-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-100"><a class="wp-block-button__link wp-element-button" href="http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/jesus-film-media/id550525738" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Get it at the App Store</a></div>



<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-100"><a class="wp-block-button__link wp-element-button" href="http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jesusfilmmedia.android.jesusfilm" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Get it on Google Play</a></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--50)">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">Stay Up-To-Date</h2>



<p>Would you like to read encouraging stories, watch clips, or learn about other tools and strategies to empower your ministry? Sign up for our weekly newsletters to get updates in your inbox and stay in the know about what we’re up to at Jesus Film Project.</p>

		<style id="skip-link-styles">
		.skip-link.screen-reader-text {
			border: 0;
			clip: rect(1px,1px,1px,1px);
			clip-path: inset(50%);
			height: 1px;
			margin: -1px;
			overflow: hidden;
			padding: 0;
			position: absolute !important;
			width: 1px;
			word-wrap: normal !important;
		}

		.skip-link.screen-reader-text:focus {
			background-color: #eee;
			clip: auto !important;
			clip-path: none;
			color: #444;
			display: block;
			font-size: 1em;
			height: auto;
			left: 5px;
			line-height: normal;
			padding: 15px 23px 14px;
			text-decoration: none;
			top: 5px;
			width: auto;
			z-index: 100000;
		}
	</style>
		<script>
	( function() {
		var skipLinkTarget = document.querySelector( 'main' ),
			sibling,
			skipLinkTargetID,
			skipLink;

		// Early exit if a skip-link target can't be located.
		if ( ! skipLinkTarget ) {
			return;
		}

		/*
		 * Get the site wrapper.
		 * The skip-link will be injected in the beginning of it.
		 */
		sibling = document.querySelector( '.wp-site-blocks' );

		// Early exit if the root element was not found.
		if ( ! sibling ) {
			return;
		}

		// Get the skip-link target's ID, and generate one if it doesn't exist.
		skipLinkTargetID = skipLinkTarget.id;
		if ( ! skipLinkTargetID ) {
			skipLinkTargetID = 'wp--skip-link--target';
			skipLinkTarget.id = skipLinkTargetID;
		}

		// Create the skip link.
		skipLink = document.createElement( 'a' );
		skipLink.classList.add( 'skip-link', 'screen-reader-text' );
		skipLink.href = '#' + skipLinkTargetID;
		skipLink.innerHTML = 'Skip to content';

		// Inject the skip link.
		sibling.parentElement.insertBefore( skipLink, sibling );
	}() );
	</script>
		<script type="text/javascript">
		function genesisBlocksShare( url, title, w, h ){
			var left = ( window.innerWidth / 2 )-( w / 2 );
			var top  = ( window.innerHeight / 2 )-( h / 2 );
			return window.open(url, title, 'toolbar=no, location=no, directories=no, status=no, menubar=no, scrollbars=no, resizable=no, copyhistory=no, width=600, height=600, top='+top+', left='+left);
		}
	</script>
	
	<svg class="clip-path">
		<clipPath id="clip-path-1" clipPathUnits="objectBoundingBox"><path d="M0.049,0 C0.022,0,0,0.03,0,0.066 v0.508 c0,0.03,0.015,0.056,0.035,0.064 l0.941,0.361 c0.012,0.004,0.023,-0.008,0.023,-0.024 V0.066 C1,0.03,0.978,0,0.951,0 H0.049"></path></clipPath>
	</svg>

	<script>
		document.addEventListener( 'splideReady', function( e ) {
			e.detail.defaults = {
				arrowPath: 'M33.7,12.7c5.4,3.4,5.4,11.2,0,14.6L15.5,38.7c-5.7,3.6-13.2-0.5-13.2-7.3V8.6c0-6.8,7.4-10.9,13.2-7.3L33.7,12.7z'
			};
		} );
	</script>

	
	<script>
		function brandedCheckoutRedirect() {
			const queryString = window.location.search;
			const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(queryString);
			const maybeRedirect = urlParams.get('thankYouRedirect');
			if (maybeRedirect && maybeRedirect.length > 0) {
				window.location = maybeRedirect;
			}
		}
		window.onOrderCompleted = function () { brandedCheckoutRedirect(); };
	</script>
